content.title: Intro
content.content:
2009
Preceded by
2009
2010
Year
2011
Followed by
2011

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2010.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
12 - Actress Elizabeth Moody dies.
13 - The Power of Tolkien's Prose: Middle-Earth's Magical Style by Steve Walker is published.
18 - Mirkwood: A Novel About JRR Tolkien by Steve Hillard is released.
20 - Cubicle 7 Entertainment announces the forth-coming release of The One Ring: The Lord of the Rings Role-playing Game.
? - Amon Hen 221 is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 12 - A Tolkien English Glossary is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Pocket Guide is published.
1 - Oliphaunt Limited Edition Poster is published.
1 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Volume III: Allies of the King, "Oath of the Rangers" is released.
4 - The History of Middle-earth is re-released in hardcover.
6 - The Tolkien Society's Smials Day in Leeds.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 222 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
1 - The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún is released in paperback.
1 - West of the Mountains, East of the Sea is published.
17 - The Tolkien Society holds its AGM in Brighton, UK.
17 - Tolkien Enterprises change it's name to Middle-earth Enterprises.
21 - Middle-earth Minstrel is published.
23 - Bo Hansson, famous for his music inspired by The Lord of the Rings, dies.
23 - 25 - DTG's Tolkien Seminar 2010.
26 - Simon Tolkien publishes the article "In My Grandfather's Footsteps".

content.title: May
content.content:
5 - The America's Next Top Model episode "Hobbits vs. Models" premieres on The CW.
15 - 16 - Middle-earth Weekend, Sarehole Mill, Birmingham.
22 - "Tolkien and Philosophy" seminar in Modena, Italy.
28 - Scholar Alexei Kondratiev dies.
30 - Guillermo del Toro departs from The Hobbit film adaptation.
? - Amon Hen 223 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
9 - Midway Games is closed, because of bankruptcy.
22 - The RiffTrax commentary of The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is released online.
26 - The Tolkien Society's Northern Hemisphere seminar: "Tolkien & Birmingham".
26 - 27 - Danish Society's Bree Summer Banquet.

content.title: July
content.content:
8 - Tolkien Calendar 2011 is published.
15-18 - Tolkien Thing 2010.
16-19 - Mythcon 41 in Dallas, Texas.
? - Amon Hen 224 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
3 - The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game is announced.
13-16 - "Edge of the Wild", Tolkien art exhibition in Moreton-in-Marsh.
28 - The Tolkien Society's Southern Hemisphere seminar: "Tolkien's Odysseys - Middle-earth and Beyond"
early - Tolkien Studies: Volume 7 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - There and Back Again: The Map of Tolkien's The Hobbit is published.
8 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Volume III: Allies of the King, "Ride of the Grey Company" is released in North America, which includes free to play for current and former subscribers.
10 - The Lord of the Rings Online goes free to play for the general public in North America.
10 - 12 - Bulgarian Tolkien Society's 6th Tolkien-Fest in Sofia.
14 - The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest is released in North America.
24-26 - Oxonmoot 2010 at Lady Margaret Hall.
24-26 - Lasse Lanta Autumn Meeting of Austrian Tolkien Society.
26 - Decentennial Celebration and Hobbit Birthdays, North East Tolkien Society
28 - The Music of the Lord of the Rings Films is published.
30 - Oct. 3 - Jubilee for Mithlond, the Gothenburg Tolkien Society of Sweden.
? - Amon Hen 225 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
1 - Middle-earth: Visions of a Modern Myth by Donato Giancola is published.
6 - The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest is released in Australia.
9 - 11 - Chilean Tolkien Society's Mereth Oronnad.
10 - Minecraft Middle-Earth begins building.
15 – Peter Jackson is officially announced as the director of The Hobbit film series.
19 - The Dragon's Apprentice is published.
25 – German translator Walter Scherf dies.
29 - The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest is released in Europe.
29 - 1 Nov. - Mereth Aderthad/EstelConXVI Annual Convention of the Spanish Tolkien Society in Valenica, Spain.
30 - Looking for the King: An Inklings Novel is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Volume III: Allies of the King, "Ride of the Grey Company" is released in Europe.
2 - The Lord of the Rings Online goes free-to-play for the general public in Europe.
3 - Author Glen GoodKnight dies.
15 - Parma Eldalamberon, issue 19 is published.
? - Amon Hen 226 is published.
? - Update 1: Journey to Winter-Home, the first update of The Lord of the Rings Online, is released.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - Middle-earth and Beyond: Essays on the World of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien (Christian Encounters) is published.

(spring/summer) - Mythlore 109/110 is published.
(spring) - Mallorn 49 is published.
(autumn) - Mallorn 50 is published.
Years
2007 2008 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013
